text: @SpeakerPelosi 2006 HKU1 Hong Kong coronavirus 2010 coronavirus https://t.co/j6k7dhuvWd. This is the WUHAN Virus. The coronavirus virus has been around for years. MERS was a coronavirus originated in the Middle East Respiratory. The coronavirus IS GENERIC name. Call it what it is. @GOPLeader

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
